question: A friend you made while you studying abroad has writen to ask you help finding a in your country. You have heard about a job in a local company thd might be suitable for himm/her. Write a letter to this your letter • tell your friend about the job and what sort of work it involves • say why you think the job would be suitaue for him/her • explain how to apply gor the job
text: I really wish that you are in high spirits. I am writing to you with respect to your letter to help you in finding a job. You will be glad to know that I have found one, that would be best fitted for you. Let me explain it to you in detail.

Recently, our company has launched a new business line focusing on FMCG products. To improve its logistics operations, the management is looking for graduates with at least 3 years of experience in the supply chain domain. The job location is Mumbai and the qualification required is MBA in Operations which is similar to yours. The work will involve understanding the current process, finding the loopholes through root-cause analysis and providing the management with  recommendations on the identified issues.

I think this can be the best workplace for you as you are currently working in similar lines and in addition, you get to live with your parents in Mumbai. You can apply for the job via the portal or you can send your resume to me so that I can refer you directly to HR. The job Id is 186670, in case you want to go through the job description.
Let me know your thoughts on this and if you wish to apply for it.
